title: Firefox Browser Freezes During Google Login Integration on WordPress
content:
Hello community,

I'm facing an issue while trying to use Google login on my WordPress website. The Google login works fine in Chrome, but in Firefox, the page freezes during the login process.

Here are the details:

Issue: After typing two characters into the email field of the Google login, Firefox becomes unresponsive, and I see a "Firefox is not responding" message. Behavior: The issue only happens in Firefox. The login works perfectly in Chrome without any issues. Steps Taken:

  • Reinstalled Firefox.
  • Cleared the browser cache and cookies.
  • Disabled all browser extensions.
  • Verified that the login works in Chrome.

It seems to be a problem specifically with Google login in Firefox. Has anyone faced a similar issue or can suggest a fix?

Thank you for your help!
creator: user273352473245563410959238521953621201718

title: Force dark mode in zen browser
content:
I visit an app called tool finder and this happen on my zen browser the banner automatically becomes dark and all the text are not visible. And I tried to troubleshoot it by this process: 1. I tried to compare my desktop snipping tool to capture the page looks and its dark. Then when I try using the screenshot tool from the zen browser it becomes white. The second image is the screenshot from the zen browser 2. I switch the workspace and use my second workspace and when I tried the link it also becomes okay.

I want to know how to fix this issue because I haven't seen anyone having this kind of issue. Thank you and I am currently inloving using this zen browser and hopefully this problem will be fix immediately because I want to see the look and feel and the right color in my screen. Thank you!
creator: jcpaclibar25

title: 아마도 탭을 여러개 열개되면 이후 어느 순간부터 비디오 재생이 되지 않음.
content:
인터넷 웹 사이트를 보다 보면 어느 순간부터 동영상이 재생되지 않음. 주로 mp4 인것 같고, youtube 는 여전히 재생 가능함. 화면이 초록색, 혹은 검은색 등으로 반응을 하지 않고, 재생되지 않음.

개인적인 경험으로 유추해 보길 탭을 많이 열면 그런것 같음. 탭을 많이 열면 50~100 혹은 그이상도 열긴 하는데 한번 영상 재생이 안되기 시작하면 껐다 켜기전까진 계속 재생이 안됨.

혹시 설정에서 뭔가 수정해 볼 수 있는 방법이 있을지?

(* 하드웨어 가속 은 꺼봤는데 소용없음)
creator: asky78

title: Self-Signed SSL Certificates (aka reply to your "world view" argument)
content:
How might I become a trusted SSL certificate issuer? You guys have really been shaking things up the past few years, so that certificates have been the biggest pain in the ass of all time. Do I have to reinvent the entire internet just to sell products online? My 4096 bit SSL certificates generated with openssl have 8x more robust encryption than most of the bilge on the internet, and in a lot of cases, 16x more robust encryption, but your browsers shoot everything down -- literally everything.

People have to make money, guys -- you don't really understand. Nobody cares about your "world view." I don't do business with any of you, you're not the government, I need a secure encrypted website to sell online, but you won't stop complaining that my SSL certificates are somehow "untrusted." I think you have mistaken "untrusted" for "uncrackable by current state of the art," because rumor has it that Google's quantum computer has difficulty cracking 2048 bit SSL certificates.

Why do you need to crack everybody's website encryption anyway? Are you trying to intercept financial transactions? How does that make you more trustworthy than me who doesn't hack anyone? I just want to sell my products in an online storefront. I think you guys really need to get off of your moral high horse, because you seem like the enemy to just about everyone I've ever talked to in my life.

Don't be surprised when I release my own browser and start blocking your crappy 256 bit SSL certificates for being inferior and "insecure." I've kind of had it with Firefox, Chromium, Chrome, Edge, etc... It seems like a colossal waste of time for me to have to release my own damned browser just to sell a freaking t-shirt online in America. This is really capitalism at its worst.
creator: jepetersen

title: Firefox crashes when logging in to gmail
content: For several weeks now, whenever I try to log in to a google account, Firefox crashes. The crash happens on the screen where you enter your email address, before the page where you enter your password. I start to enter my email, and about 3 letters in to typing my entire browser freezes. The crash also happens in troubleshooting mode, so I know that it isn't a problem with one of my plug-ins. This isn't an urgent issue, I can get by with the gmail accounts that are already logged in, but it is really annoying.
creator: samhunt0212

title: Folder has disapperad from list
content:
I accidentally moved a folder into another folder, when I tried to move it back into the main folder tree it disappeared. The folder and data is still there but it simply does not show up. It's a folder used to temporarily store emails to be replied later on (AA-TO Reply).

I have created a 2nd folder AA-TO Reply2 and searching for stuff I have in the other folder I can find some and copy them to the new folder but I can't remember all that I have.

If i search say for Physiotherapy (I have an appointment next week) I could find the email and it shows up as being in the AA-TO Reply (the one that has disappeared) but can't find a way to make it visible again.

There are no folders showing as having another sub folder inside them ( with a >).

title: slow loading web pages & others websites won't sigin in
content:
1. some webpages extremely slow loading while others are fine. All load fine on Chrome. Why? Particularly true with https://www.tab.com.au/ that I use 2-3 times a week. In Chrome it's immediate connect.

2. cannot sign in to my members account on (eg) Choice but easy on Chrome. Why?

Love Firefox when it works but I'm getting so frustrated. Seriously considering going back to Chrome - reluctantly.

Also so many website/page freezes & non responses over last ~3 months. Grrrr

title: Lost Access to Spectrum Email Using Firefox Browser
content:
I am no longer able to log into my Spectrum email using Firefox as my browser. I can login using Chrome. Firefox worked fine until I tried logging in on November 21 and then I ended up in a loop. I can access other parts of Spectrum, just can't get to mail. I have it set up to transfer to Outlook and than works fine. Spectrum says there is nothing they can do about it.

Has anyone else had this experience? If so, were you able to resolve it?
